addGeojsonInfo: Note that the GeoJSON format uses the wgs84 coordinate system. Save only one area boundary to the file.
adminCommentMessage: You are logged in as an administrator. Your name and organization will be displayed with your comment
alreadyFavorite: The hearing is already in favorites.
alreadyVoted: You have already voted for this comment.

commentConditions: All comments will be published {linkToDefinition} in the online service {linkToLicense}. If you are not logged in, you may leave an anonymous comment. The comments may be moderated if they contain insulting or offensive language.
commentEdited: Your comment has been edited. Thank you!
commentHelpAnswerOrCommentRequired: Answer at least one question or write a comment.
commentHelpStarRequired: Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
commentMapAdditionalInfo: Additional info related to the map (e.g. address)
commentMapTitle: Tag your suggestion on the map
commentMapInstructions: To tag your suggestion you must first choose a marking tool after which you can draw/tag on the map. To delete existing markings on the map you must first click the trashbin and then select 'Clear All'.
commentReceived: Your comment has been received. Thank you!
commentOrAnswerRequiredError: Answer at least one question or write a comment.
sectionCommentDeletedMessage: This message has been deleted on{date}, because it did not comply with the rules of the Voice your opinion service. https://kerrokantasi.hel.fi/info?lang=en
sectionCommentSelfDeletedMessage: The author deleted their own message.
sectionCommentEditedMessage: The message has been edited by the author.
sectionCommentModeratedMessage: This message has been edited because it violated the terms of use of the service. https://kerrokantasi.hel.fi/info?lang=en
commentShowMap: Map marker added. Show on the map
contactPersonOrganizationHelpText: If no organization is defined, your organization will be used by default.
contactPersonAdditionalInfoHelpText: Company/Entity to which the contact person belongs. Shown to users instead of the organization name, if 'External actors' has been selected as the organization
contactTitlePlaceholder: Enter contact person's job title or role description...
defaultClosureInfo: This hearing is closed. You may no longer give comments or vote for them
deleteConfirmation: Are your sure to delete the comment?
descriptionTag: Voice your opinion. Join us in developing the city and participate in open hearings.

hearingArea: If the hearing does not include the entire city, draw the exact area of the hearing on the map.
hearingCommentingMapChoice3: In use, marker, square and polygon marking
hearingLabelsPlaceholder: Select appropriate keywords for the hearing
hearingPreviewLinkFailed: Unable to copy preview link to clipboard.

hearingTranslationNotAvailable: This hearing hasn't been published in English
imageFileUploadError: An error occurred while uploading image.
imageSizeError: Image too big, maximum size of an image is 1MB
loginAttemptFailed: Failed to login. Please try again in a moment.
logInToAnswer: Log in to answer and see results
maintenanceNotificationText: The new Helsinki Profile login will be introduced 15th of May.
maintenanceNotificationText2: The Google, YLE and Facebook login methods will be removed. At the same time, employees' AD authentication will change. After the change, the Helsinki Profile service will be used for login, and users will be able to manage their own data in the city's various digital services. With the introduction of the Helsinki Profile, access to previous comments made while logged in will be disabled.
maintenanceNotificationText3: The change will also remove content production rights for employees In order to produce content. You should take the time to renew your content production rights.
multipleChoiceQuestion: Multiple choice question (respondent can select multiple options)
multipleImages: If you want to add multiple images, choose them by clicking while keeping CTRL or CMD button pressed.
name: Name
projectSelection: If the hearing belongs to a multi-phase project, select the project here.
question: Question
questionHelpMulti: You can choose one or more options.
questionTextPlaceholder: Write here the question you want citizens to answer.
registeredUserCommentMessage: Your name or nickname will be displayed with your comment. You can remove your name or nickname by clearing the field.
sectionAbstractPlaceholder: Describe the main topic briefly here. Displayed at the beginning in a larger font than other text content.
sectionContentPlaceholder: The actual content, to which you can add formatting, links and images
sectionImageHelpText: Recommended image size is 960 × 720 (Max. 1MB). Larger images will be scaled to the recommended size.
sectionImagePlaceholder: Explain or complete the image with a caption. Mention the name of the photographer, if necessary.
sectionTitlePlaceholder: Add a descriptive title for the section.
selectHearingComments: Select a hearing to show its comments
singleChoiceQuestion: Single choice question (respondent selects one option)
slugInUse: The address you selected was in use and was therefore changed.

tryingToDeletePhaseWithHearings: A phase that already has hearings cannot be deleted.
unpublishedAttachments: Attachments cannot be downloaded when the hearing is not published.
